dn24:1.1.2: ekam samayam bhagava mallesu viharati anupiyam nama mallanam nigamo.
dn24:1.1.3: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya anupiyam pindaya pavisi.
dn24:1.1.6: Yannunaham yena bhaggavagottassa paribbajakassa aramo, yena bhaggavagotto paribbajako tenupasankameyyan”ti.
dn24:1.2.1: Atha kho bhagava yena bhaggavagottassa paribbajakassa aramo, yena bhaggavagotto paribbajako tenupasankami.
dn24:1.2.2: Atha kho bhaggavagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn24:1.2.5: Cirassam kho, bhante, bhagava imam pariyayamakasi yadidam idhagamanaya.
dn24:1.2.8: Bhaggavagottopi kho paribbajako annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
dn24:1.2.9: Ekamantam nisinno kho bhaggavagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn24:1.2.10: “purimani, bhante, divasani purimatarani sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam etadavoca:
dn24:1.2.13: Kaccetam, bhante, tatheva, yatha sunakkhatto licchaviputto avaca”ti?
dn24:1.2.14: “Tatheva kho etam, bhaggava, yatha sunakkhatto licchaviputto avaca.
dn24:1.3.1: Purimani, bhaggava, divasani purimatarani sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto mam etadavoca:
dn24:1.3.3: Na danaham, bhante, bhagavantam uddissa viharissami’ti.
dn24:1.3.4: Evam vutte, aham, bhaggava, sunakkhattam licchaviputtam etadavocam:
dn24:1.3.6: ehi tvam, sunakkhatta, mamam uddissa viharahi’ti?
dn24:1.3.12: ehi tvam, sunakkhatta, mamam uddissa viharahiti.
dn24:1.3.15: Evam sante, moghapurisa, ko santo kam paccacikkhasi?
dn24:1.3.16: Passa, moghapurisa, yavanca te idam aparaddhan’ti.
dn24:1.4.1: ‘Na hi pana me, bhante, bhagava uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karoti’ti.
dn24:1.4.3: ehi tvam, sunakkhatta, mamam uddissa viharahi, aham te uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karissami’ti?
dn24:1.4.6: aham, bhante, bhagavantam uddissa viharissami, bhagava me uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karissati’ti?
dn24:1.4.9: ehi tvam, sunakkhatta, mamam uddissa viharahi, aham te uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karissamiti;
dn24:1.4.11: aham, bhante, bhagavantam uddissa viharissami, bhagava me uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karissatiti.
dn24:1.4.12: Evam sante, moghapurisa, ko santo kam paccacikkhasi?
dn24:1.4.14: kate va uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariye akate va uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariye yassatthaya maya dhammo desito so niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya’ti?
dn24:1.4.15: ‘Kate va, bhante, uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariye akate va uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariye yassatthaya bhagavata dhammo desito so niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya’ti.
dn24:1.4.16: ‘Iti kira, sunakkhatta, kate va uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariye, akate va uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariye, yassatthaya maya dhammo desito, so niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya.
dn24:1.4.17: Tatra, sunakkhatta, kim uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam katam karissati?
dn24:1.4.18: Passa, moghapurisa, yavanca te idam aparaddhan’ti.
dn24:1.5.1: ‘Na hi pana me, bhante, bhagava aggannam pannapeti’ti?
dn24:1.5.3: ehi tvam, sunakkhatta, mamam uddissa viharahi, aham te aggannam pannapessami’ti?
dn24:1.5.6: aham, bhante, bhagavantam uddissa viharissami, bhagava me aggannam pannapessati’ti?
dn24:1.5.9: ehi tvam, sunakkhatta, mamam uddissa viharahi, aham te aggannam pannapessamiti.
dn24:1.5.11: aham, bhante, bhagavantam uddissa viharissami, bhagava me aggannam pannapessatiti.
dn24:1.5.12: Evam sante, moghapurisa, ko santo kam paccacikkhasi?
dn24:1.5.14: pannatte va agganne, apannatte va agganne, yassatthaya maya dhammo desito, so niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya’ti?
dn24:1.5.15: ‘Pannatte va, bhante, agganne, apannatte va agganne, yassatthaya bhagavata dhammo desito, so niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya’ti.
dn24:1.5.16: ‘Iti kira, sunakkhatta, pannatte va agganne, apannatte va agganne, yassatthaya maya dhammo desito, so niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya.
dn24:1.5.17: Tatra, sunakkhatta, kim aggannam pannattam karissati?
dn24:1.5.18: Passa, moghapurisa, yavanca te idam aparaddham.
dn24:1.6.1: Anekapariyayena kho te, sunakkhatta, mama vanno bhasito vajjigame—
dn24:1.6.2: itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
dn24:1.6.3: Iti kho te, sunakkhatta, anekapariyayena mama vanno bhasito vajjigame.
dn24:1.6.4: Anekapariyayena kho te, sunakkhatta, dhammassa vanno bhasito vajjigame—
dn24:1.6.5: svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhiti.
dn24:1.6.6: Iti kho te, sunakkhatta, anekapariyayena dhammassa vanno bhasito vajjigame.
dn24:1.6.7: Anekapariyayena kho te, sunakkhatta, sanghassa vanno bhasito vajjigame—
dn24:1.6.8: suppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, ujuppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, nayappatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, samicippatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, yadidam cattari purisayugani attha purisapuggala, esa bhagavato savakasangho, ahuneyyo pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassati.
dn24:1.6.9: Iti kho te, sunakkhatta, anekapariyayena sanghassa vanno bhasito vajjigame.
dn24:1.6.10: Arocayami kho te, sunakkhatta, pativedayami kho te, sunakkhatta.
dn24:1.6.11: Bhavissanti kho te, sunakkhatta, vattaro, no visahi sunakkhatto licchaviputto samane gotame brahmacariyam caritum, so avisahanto sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattoti.
dn24:1.6.12: Iti kho te, sunakkhatta, bhavissanti vattaro’ti.
dn24:1.6.13: Evam kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto maya vuccamano apakkameva imasma dhammavinaya, yatha tam apayiko nerayiko.
dn24:1.7.1: Ekamidaham, bhaggava, samayam thulusu viharami uttaraka nama thulunam nigamo.
dn24:1.7.2: Atha khvaham, bhaggava, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya sunakkhattena licchaviputtena pacchasamanena uttarakam pindaya pavisim.
dn24:1.7.3: Tena kho pana samayena acelo korakkhattiyo kukkuravatiko catukkundiko chamanikinnam bhakkhasam mukheneva khadati, mukheneva bhunjati.
dn24:1.7.4: Addasa kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto acelam korakkhattiyam kukkuravatikam catukkundikam chamanikinnam bhakkhasam mukheneva khadantam mukheneva bhunjantam.
dn24:1.7.6: ‘sadhurupo vata bho ayam samano catukkundiko chamanikinnam bhakkhasam mukheneva khadati, mukheneva bhunjati’ti.
dn24:1.7.7: Atha khvaham, bhaggava, sunakkhattassa licchaviputtassa cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya sunakkhattam licchaviputtam etadavocam:
dn24:1.7.11: ‘Nanu te, sunakkhatta, imam acelam korakkhattiyam kukkuravatikam catukkundikam chamanikinnam bhakkhasam mukheneva khadantam mukheneva bhunjantam disvana etadahosi—
dn24:1.7.12: sadhurupo vata bho ayam samano catukkundiko chamanikinnam bhakkhasam mukheneva khadati, mukheneva bhunjati’ti?
dn24:1.7.14: Kim pana, bhante, bhagava arahattassa maccharayati’ti?
dn24:1.7.16: Api ca tuyhevetam papakam ditthigatam uppannam, tam pajaha.
dn24:1.7.17: Ma te ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
dn24:1.7.18: Yam kho panetam, sunakkhatta, mannasi acelam korakkhattiyam—sadhurupo ayam samanoti. So sattamam divasam alasakena kalam karissati.
dn24:1.7.19: Kalankato ca kalakancika nama asura sabbanihino asurakayo, tatra upapajjissati.
dn24:1.7.21: Akankhamano ca tvam, sunakkhatta, acelam korakkhattiyam upasankamitva puccheyyasi—
dn24:1.7.23: Thanam kho panetam, sunakkhatta, vijjati yam te acelo korakkhattiyo byakarissati—
dn24:1.7.25: kalakancika nama asura sabbanihino asurakayo, tatramhi upapanno’ti.
dn24:1.8.1: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yena acelo korakkhattiyo tenupasankami; upasankamitva acelam korakkhattiyam etadavoca:
dn24:1.8.3: acelo korakkhattiyo sattamam divasam alasakena kalam karissati.
dn24:1.8.4: Kalankato ca kalakancika nama asura sabbanihino asurakayo, tatra upapajjissati.
dn24:1.8.6: Yena tvam, avuso korakkhattiya, mattam mattanca bhattam bhunjeyyasi, mattam mattanca paniyam piveyyasi.
dn24:1.8.7: Yatha samanassa gotamassa miccha assa vacanan’ti.
dn24:1.8.8: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto ekadvihikaya sattarattindivani ganesi, yatha tam tathagatassa asaddahamano.
dn24:1.8.9: Atha kho, bhaggava, acelo korakkhattiyo sattamam divasam alasakena kalamakasi.
dn24:1.8.10: kalankato ca kalakancika nama asura sabbanihino asurakayo, tatra upapajji.
dn24:1.9.2: ‘acelo kira korakkhattiyo alasakena kalankato biranatthambake susane chaddito’ti.
dn24:1.9.3: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yena biranatthambakam susanam, yena acelo korakkhattiyo tenupasankami; upasankamitva acelam korakkhattiyam tikkhattum panina akotesi:
dn24:1.9.5: Atha kho, bhaggava, acelo korakkhattiyo panina pitthim paripunchanto vutthasi.
dn24:1.9.7: Kalakancika nama asura sabbanihino asurakayo, tatramhi upapanno’ti vatva tattheva uttano papati.
dn24:1.10.1: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho aham, bhaggava, sunakkhattam licchaviputtam etadavocam:
dn24:1.10.3: yatheva te aham acelam korakkhattiyam arabbha byakasim, tatheva tam vipakam, annatha va’ti?
dn24:1.10.4: ‘Yatheva me, bhante, bhagava acelam korakkhattiyam arabbha byakasi, tatheva tam vipakam, no annatha’ti.
dn24:1.10.6: yadi evam sante katam va hoti uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam, akatam va’ti?
dn24:1.10.7: ‘Addha kho, bhante, evam sante katam hoti uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam, no akatan’ti.
dn24:1.10.8: ‘Evampi kho mam tvam, moghapurisa, uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karontam evam vadesi—
dn24:1.10.9: na hi pana me, bhante, bhagava uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karotiti.
dn24:1.10.10: Passa, moghapurisa, yavanca te idam aparaddhan’ti.
dn24:1.10.11: Evampi kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto maya vuccamano apakkameva imasma dhammavinaya, yatha tam apayiko nerayiko.
dn24:1.11.1: Ekamidaham, bhaggava, samayam vesaliyam viharami mahavane kutagarasalayam.
dn24:1.11.2: Tena kho pana samayena acelo kalaramattako vesaliyam pativasati labhaggappatto ceva yasaggappatto ca vajjigame.
dn24:1.11.4: ‘yavajivam acelako assam, na vattham paridaheyyam, yavajivam brahmacari assam, na methunam dhammam patiseveyyam, yavajivam suramamseneva yapeyyam, na odanakummasam bhunjeyyam.
dn24:1.11.5: Puratthimena vesalim udenam nama cetiyam, tam natikkameyyam, dakkhinena vesalim gotamakam nama cetiyam, tam natikkameyyam, pacchimena vesalim sattambam nama cetiyam, tam natikkameyyam, uttarena vesalim bahuputtam nama cetiyam tam natikkameyyan’ti.
dn24:1.11.6: So imesam sattannam vatapadanam samadanahetu labhaggappatto ceva yasaggappatto ca vajjigame.
dn24:1.12.1: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yena acelo kalaramattako tenupasankami; upasankamitva acelam kalaramattakam panham apucchi.
dn24:1.12.2: Tassa acelo kalaramattako panham puttho na sampayasi.
dn24:1.12.4: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhattassa licchaviputtassa etadahosi:
dn24:1.12.6: Ma vata no ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya’ti.
dn24:1.13.1: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho aham, bhaggava, sunakkhattam licchaviputtam etadavocam:
dn24:1.13.4: tvampi nama, moghapurisa, samano sakyaputtiyo patijanissasi’ti?
dn24:1.13.5: ‘Nanu tvam, sunakkhatta, acelam kalaramattakam upasankamitva panham apucchi.
dn24:1.13.6: Tassa te acelo kalaramattako panham puttho na sampayasi.
dn24:1.13.10: Ma vata no ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya”’ti.
dn24:1.13.12: Kim pana, bhante, bhagava arahattassa maccharayati’ti?
dn24:1.13.14: api ca tuyhevetam papakam ditthigatam uppannam, tam pajaha.
dn24:1.13.15: Ma te ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
dn24:1.13.16: Yam kho panetam, sunakkhatta, mannasi acelam kalaramattakam—
dn24:1.13.17: sadhurupo ayam samanoti, so nacirasseva parihito sanucariko vicaranto odanakummasam bhunjamano sabbaneva vesaliyani cetiyani samatikkamitva yasa nihino kalam karissati’ti.
dn24:1.13.18: Atha kho, bhaggava, acelo kalaramattako nacirasseva parihito sanucariko vicaranto odanakummasam bhunjamano sabbaneva vesaliyani cetiyani samatikkamitva yasa nihino kalamakasi.
dn24:1.14.2: ‘acelo kira kalaramattako parihito sanucariko vicaranto odanakummasam bhunjamano sabbaneva vesaliyani cetiyani samatikkamitva yasa nihino kalankato’ti.
dn24:1.14.3: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho aham, bhaggava, sunakkhattam licchaviputtam etadavocam:
dn24:1.14.5: yatheva te aham acelam kalaramattakam arabbha byakasim, tatheva tam vipakam, annatha va’ti?
dn24:1.14.6: ‘Yatheva me, bhante, bhagava acelam kalaramattakam arabbha byakasi, tatheva tam vipakam, no annatha’ti.
dn24:1.14.8: yadi evam sante katam va hoti uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam akatam va’ti?
dn24:1.14.9: ‘Addha kho, bhante, evam sante katam hoti uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam, no akatan’ti.
dn24:1.14.10: ‘Evampi kho mam tvam, moghapurisa, uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karontam evam vadesi:
dn24:1.14.11: “na hi pana me, bhante, bhagava uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karoti”ti.
dn24:1.14.12: Passa, moghapurisa, yavanca te idam aparaddhan’ti.
dn24:1.14.13: Evampi kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto maya vuccamano apakkameva imasma dhammavinaya, yatha tam apayiko nerayiko.
dn24:1.15.1: Ekamidaham, bhaggava, samayam tattheva vesaliyam viharami mahavane kutagarasalayam.
dn24:1.15.2: Tena kho pana samayena acelo pathikaputto vesaliyam pativasati labhaggappatto ceva yasaggappatto ca vajjigame.
dn24:1.15.3: So vesaliyam parisati evam vacam bhasati:
dn24:1.15.5: Nanavado kho pana nanavadena arahati uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam dassetum.
dn24:1.15.6: Samano gotamo upaddhapatham agaccheyya, ahampi upaddhapatham gaccheyyam.
dn24:1.15.7: Te tattha ubhopi uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam kareyyama.
dn24:1.15.8: Ekance samano gotamo uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karissati, dvaham karissami.
dn24:1.15.9: Dve ce samano gotamo uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyani karissati, cattaraham karissami.
dn24:1.15.10: Cattari ce samano gotamo uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyani karissati, atthaham karissami.
dn24:1.15.11: Iti yavatakam yavatakam samano gotamo uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karissati, taddigunam taddigunaham karissami’ti.
dn24:1.16.1: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto mam etadavoca:
dn24:1.16.2: ‘acelo, bhante, pathikaputto vesaliyam pativasati labhaggappatto ceva yasaggappatto ca vajjigame.
dn24:1.16.3: So vesaliyam parisati evam vacam bhasati:
dn24:1.16.5: Nanavado kho pana nanavadena arahati uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam dassetum.
dn24:1.16.6: Samano gotamo upaddhapatham agaccheyya, ahampi upaddhapatham gaccheyyam.
dn24:1.16.7: Te tattha ubhopi uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam kareyyama.
dn24:1.16.8: Ekance samano gotamo uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karissati, dvaham karissami.
dn24:1.16.9: Dve ce samano gotamo uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyani karissati, cattaraham karissami.
dn24:1.16.10: Cattari ce samano gotamo uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyani karissati, atthaham karissami.
dn24:1.16.11: Iti yavatakam yavatakam samano gotamo uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karissati, taddigunam taddigunaham karissami”’ti.
dn24:1.16.12: Evam vutte, aham, bhaggava, sunakkhattam licchaviputtam etadavocam:
dn24:1.16.13: ‘abhabbo kho, sunakkhatta, acelo pathikaputto tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva mama sammukhibhavam agantum.
dn24:1.16.15: aham tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva samanassa gotamassa sammukhibhavam gaccheyyanti, muddhapi tassa vipateyya’ti.
dn24:1.17.1: ‘Rakkhatetam, bhante, bhagava vacam, rakkhatetam sugato vacan’ti.
dn24:1.17.2: ‘Kim pana mam tvam, sunakkhatta, evam vadesi—
dn24:1.17.3: rakkhatetam, bhante, bhagava vacam, rakkhatetam sugato vacan’ti?
dn24:1.17.4: ‘Bhagavata cassa, bhante, esa vaca ekamsena odharita—
dn24:1.17.5: abhabbo acelo pathikaputto tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva mama sammukhibhavam agantum.
dn24:1.17.7: aham tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva samanassa gotamassa sammukhibhavam gaccheyyanti, muddhapi tassa vipateyyati.
dn24:1.17.8: Acelo ca, bhante, pathikaputto viruparupena bhagavato sammukhibhavam agaccheyya, tadassa bhagavato musa’ti.
dn24:1.18.1: ‘Api nu, sunakkhatta, tathagato tam vacam bhaseyya ya sa vaca dvayagamini’ti?
dn24:1.18.2: ‘Kim pana, bhante, bhagavata acelo pathikaputto cetasa ceto paricca vidito—
dn24:1.18.3: abhabbo acelo pathikaputto tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva mama sammukhibhavam agantum.
dn24:1.18.5: aham tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva samanassa gotamassa sammukhibhavam gaccheyyanti, muddhapi tassa vipateyyati?
dn24:1.18.7: abhabbo, bhante, acelo pathikaputto tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva bhagavato sammukhibhavam agantum.
dn24:1.18.9: aham tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva samanassa gotamassa sammukhibhavam gaccheyyanti, muddhapi tassa vipateyya’ti?
dn24:1.18.10: ‘Cetasa ceto paricca vidito ceva me, sunakkhatta, acelo pathikaputto—
dn24:1.18.11: abhabbo acelo pathikaputto tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva mama sammukhibhavam agantum.

dn24:2.13.1: Atha khvaham, bhaggava, tam parisam dhammiya kathaya sandassesim samadapesim samuttejesim sampahamsesim, tam parisam dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva mahabandhana mokkham karitva caturasitipanasahassani mahavidugga uddharitva tejodhatum samapajjitva sattatalam vehasam abbhuggantva annam sattatalampi accim abhinimminitva pajjalitva dhumayitva mahavane kutagarasalayam paccutthasim.
dn24:2.13.2: Atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho aham, bhaggava, sunakkhattam licchaviputtam etadavocam:
dn24:2.13.4: yatheva te aham acelam pathikaputtam arabbha byakasim, tatheva tam vipakam annatha va’ti?
dn24:2.13.5: ‘Yatheva me, bhante, bhagava acelam pathikaputtam arabbha byakasi, tatheva tam vipakam, no annatha’ti.
dn24:2.13.7: yadi evam sante katam va hoti uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam, akatam va’ti?
dn24:2.13.8: ‘Addha kho, bhante, evam sante katam hoti uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam, no akatan’ti.
dn24:2.13.9: ‘Evampi kho mam tvam, moghapurisa, uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karontam evam vadesi—
dn24:2.13.10: na hi pana me, bhante, bhagava uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam karotiti.
dn24:2.13.11: Passa, moghapurisa, yavanca te idam aparaddhan’ti.
dn24:2.13.12: Evampi kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto maya vuccamano apakkameva imasma dhammavinaya, yatha tam apayiko nerayiko.
dn24:2.14.2: Tanca pajanami, tato ca uttaritaram pajanami, tanca pajanam na paramasami, aparamasato ca me paccattanneva nibbuti vidita, yadabhijanam tathagato no anayam apajjati.
dn24:2.14.3: Santi, bhaggava, eke samanabrahmana issarakuttam brahmakuttam acariyakam aggannam pannapenti.
dn24:2.14.5: ‘saccam kira tumhe ayasmanto issarakuttam brahmakuttam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.14.6: Te ca me evam puttha, ‘amo’ti patijananti.
dn24:2.14.8: ‘kathamvihitakam pana tumhe ayasmanto issarakuttam brahmakuttam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.14.9: Te maya puttha na sampayanti, asampayanta mamanneva patipucchanti.
dn24:2.14.11: ‘Hoti kho so, avuso, samayo yam kadaci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena ayam loko samvattati.
dn24:2.14.12: Samvattamane loke yebhuyyena satta abhassarasamvattanika honti.
dn24:2.14.13: Te tattha honti manomaya pitibhakkha sayampabha antalikkhacara subhatthayino ciram dighamaddhanam titthanti.
dn24:2.15.1: Hoti kho so, avuso, samayo yam kadaci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena ayam loko vivattati.
dn24:2.15.3: Atha kho annataro satto ayukkhaya va punnakkhaya va abhassarakaya cavitva sunnam brahmavimanam upapajjati.
dn24:2.15.4: So tattha hoti manomayo pitibhakkho sayampabho antalikkhacaro subhatthayi, ciram dighamaddhanam titthati.
dn24:2.16.1: Tassa tattha ekakassa digharattam nivusitatta anabhirati paritassana uppajjati—
dn24:2.16.2: aho vata annepi satta itthattam agaccheyyunti.
dn24:2.16.3: Atha annepi satta ayukkhaya va punnakkhaya va abhassarakaya cavitva sunnam brahmavimanam upapajjanti tassa sattassa sahabyatam.
dn24:2.16.4: Tepi tattha honti manomaya pitibhakkha sayampabha antalikkhacara subhatthayino, ciram dighamaddhanam titthanti.
dn24:2.17.1: Tatravuso, yo so satto pathamam upapanno, tassa evam hoti—
dn24:2.17.2: ahamasmi brahma mahabrahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti issaro katta nimmata settho sajita vasi pita bhutabhabyanam, maya ime satta nimmita.
dn24:2.17.5: aho vata annepi satta itthattam agaccheyyunti;
dn24:2.17.6: iti mama ca manopanidhi. Ime ca satta itthattam agatati.
dn24:2.17.7: Yepi te satta paccha upapanna, tesampi evam hoti—
dn24:2.17.8: ayam kho bhavam brahma mahabrahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti issaro katta nimmata settho sajita vasi pita bhutabhabyanam;
dn24:2.17.11: Imanhi mayam addasama idha pathamam upapannam; mayam panamha paccha upapannati.
dn24:2.17.12: Tatravuso, yo so satto pathamam upapanno, so dighayukataro ca hoti vannavantataro ca mahesakkhataro ca.
dn24:2.17.13: Ye pana te satta paccha upapanna, te appayukatara ca honti dubbannatara ca appesakkhatara ca.
dn24:2.17.14: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati, yam annataro satto tamha kaya cavitva itthattam agacchati.
dn24:2.17.15: Itthattam agato samano agarasma anagariyam pabbajati.
dn24:2.17.16: Agarasma anagariyam pabbajito samano atappamanvaya padhanamanvaya anuyogamanvaya appamadamanvaya sammamanasikaramanvaya tatharupam cetosamadhim phusati, yathasamahite citte tam pubbenivasam anussarati; tato param nanussarati.
dn24:2.17.18: “yo kho so bhavam brahma mahabrahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti issaro katta nimmata settho sajita vasi pita bhutabhabyanam, yena mayam bhota brahmuna nimmita. So nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo sassatisamam tatheva thassati.
dn24:2.17.19: Ye pana mayam ahumha tena bhota brahmuna nimmita, te mayam anicca addhuva appayuka cavanadhamma itthattam agata”ti.
dn24:2.17.20: Evamvihitakam no tumhe ayasmanto issarakuttam brahmakuttam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti.
dn24:2.17.22: ‘evam kho no, avuso gotama, sutam, yathevayasma gotamo aha’ti.
dn24:2.17.24: Tanca pajanami, tato ca uttaritaram pajanami, tanca pajanam na paramasami, aparamasato ca me paccattanneva nibbuti vidita. Yadabhijanam tathagato no anayam apajjati.
dn24:2.18.1: Santi, bhaggava, eke samanabrahmana khiddapadosikam acariyakam aggannam pannapenti.
dn24:2.18.3: ‘saccam kira tumhe ayasmanto khiddapadosikam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.18.4: Te ca me evam puttha ‘amo’ti patijananti.
dn24:2.18.6: ‘kathamvihitakam pana tumhe ayasmanto khiddapadosikam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.18.7: Te maya puttha na sampayanti, asampayanta mamanneva patipucchanti,
dn24:2.18.9: ‘Santavuso, khiddapadosika nama deva. Te ativelam hassakhiddaratidhammasamapanna viharanti. Tesam ativelam hassakhiddaratidhammasamapannanam viharatam sati sammussati, satiya sammosa te deva tamha kaya cavanti.
dn24:2.18.10: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati, yam annataro satto tamha kaya cavitva itthattam agacchati,
dn24:2.18.11: itthattam agato samano agarasma anagariyam pabbajati,
dn24:2.18.12: agarasma anagariyam pabbajito samano atappamanvaya padhanamanvaya anuyogamanvaya appamadamanvaya sammamanasikaramanvaya tatharupam cetosamadhim phusati, yathasamahite citte tam pubbenivasam anussarati; tato param nanussarati.
dn24:2.18.14: “ye kho te bhonto deva na khiddapadosika te na ativelam hassakhiddaratidhammasamapanna viharanti. Tesam nativelam hassakhiddaratidhammasamapannanam viharatam sati na sammussati, satiya asammosa te deva tamha kaya na cavanti,
dn24:2.18.15: nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma sassatisamam tatheva thassanti.
dn24:2.18.16: Ye pana mayam ahumha khiddapadosika te mayam ativelam hassakhiddaratidhammasamapanna viharimha, tesam no ativelam hassakhiddaratidhammasamapannanam viharatam sati sammussati, satiya sammosa evam mayam tamha kaya cuta,
dn24:2.18.17: anicca addhuva appayuka cavanadhamma itthattam agata”ti.
dn24:2.18.18: Evamvihitakam no tumhe ayasmanto khiddapadosikam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti.
dn24:2.18.20: ‘evam kho no, avuso gotama, sutam, yathevayasma gotamo aha’ti.
dn24:2.19.1: Santi, bhaggava, eke samanabrahmana manopadosikam acariyakam aggannam pannapenti.
dn24:2.19.3: ‘saccam kira tumhe ayasmanto manopadosikam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.19.4: Te ca me evam puttha ‘amo’ti patijananti.
dn24:2.19.6: ‘kathamvihitakam pana tumhe ayasmanto manopadosikam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.19.7: Te maya puttha na sampayanti, asampayanta mamanneva patipucchanti.
dn24:2.19.9: ‘Santavuso, manopadosika nama deva. Te ativelam annamannam upanijjhayanti. Te ativelam annamannam upanijjhayanta annamannamhi cittani padusenti. Te annamannam padutthacitta kilantakaya kilantacitta. Te deva tamha kaya cavanti.
dn24:2.19.10: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati, yam annataro satto tamha kaya cavitva itthattam agacchati.
dn24:2.19.11: Itthattam agato samano agarasma anagariyam pabbajati.
dn24:2.19.12: Agarasma anagariyam pabbajito samano atappamanvaya padhanamanvaya anuyogamanvaya appamadamanvaya sammamanasikaramanvaya tatharupam cetosamadhim phusati, yathasamahite citte tam pubbenivasam anussarati, tato param nanussarati.
dn24:2.19.14: “ye kho te bhonto deva na manopadosika te nativelam annamannam upanijjhayanti. Te nativelam annamannam upanijjhayanta annamannamhi cittani nappadusenti. Te annamannam appadutthacitta akilantakaya akilantacitta. Te deva tamha kaya na cavanti,
dn24:2.19.15: nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma sassatisamam tatheva thassanti.
dn24:2.19.16: Ye pana mayam ahumha manopadosika, te mayam ativelam annamannam upanijjhayimha. Te mayam ativelam annamannam upanijjhayanta annamannamhi cittani padusimha. Te mayam annamannam padutthacitta kilantakaya kilantacitta. Evam mayam tamha kaya cuta,
dn24:2.19.17: anicca addhuva appayuka cavanadhamma itthattam agata”ti.
dn24:2.19.18: Evamvihitakam no tumhe ayasmanto manopadosikam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti.
dn24:2.19.20: ‘evam kho no, avuso gotama, sutam, yathevayasma gotamo aha’ti.
dn24:2.20.1: Santi, bhaggava, eke samanabrahmana adhiccasamuppannam acariyakam aggannam pannapenti.
dn24:2.20.3: ‘saccam kira tumhe ayasmanto adhiccasamuppannam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.20.4: Te ca me evam puttha ‘amo’ti patijananti.
dn24:2.20.6: ‘kathamvihitakam pana tumhe ayasmanto adhiccasamuppannam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.20.7: Te maya puttha na sampayanti, asampayanta mamanneva patipucchanti.
dn24:2.20.10: Sannuppada ca pana te deva tamha kaya cavanti.
dn24:2.20.11: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati yam annataro satto tamha kaya cavitva itthattam agacchati.
dn24:2.20.12: Itthattam agato samano agarasma anagariyam pabbajati.
dn24:2.20.13: Agarasma anagariyam pabbajito samano atappamanvaya padhanamanvaya anuyogamanvaya appamadamanvaya sammamanasikaramanvaya tatharupam cetosamadhim phusati, yathasamahite citte tam sannuppadam anussarati, tato param nanussarati’.
dn24:2.20.17: Ahanhi pubbe nahosim, somhi etarahi ahutva santataya parinato’ti.
dn24:2.20.18: ‘Evamvihitakam no tumhe ayasmanto adhiccasamuppannam acariyakam aggannam pannapetha’ti?
dn24:2.20.20: ‘evam kho no, avuso gotama, sutam yathevayasma gotamo aha’ti.
dn24:2.20.21: Aggannancaham, bhaggava, pajanami tanca pajanami, tato ca uttaritaram pajanami, tanca pajanam na paramasami, aparamasato ca me paccattanneva nibbuti vidita.
dn24:2.21.1: Evamvadim kho mam, bhaggava, evamakkhayim eke samanabrahmana asata tuccha musa abhutena abbhacikkhanti:
dn24:2.21.4: yasmim samaye subham vimokkham upasampajja viharati, sabbam tasmim samaye asubhantveva pajanati’ti.
dn24:2.21.5: Na kho panaham, bhaggava, evam vadami:
dn24:2.21.6: ‘yasmim samaye subham vimokkham upasampajja viharati, sabbam tasmim samaye asubhantveva pajanati’ti.
dn24:2.21.8: ‘yasmim samaye subham vimokkham upasampajja viharati, subhantveva tasmim samaye pajanati’”ti.
dn24:2.21.9: “Te ca, bhante, viparita, ye bhagavantam viparitato dahanti bhikkhavo ca.
dn24:2.21.10: Evampasanno aham, bhante, bhagavati. Pahoti me bhagava tatha dhammam desetum, yatha aham subham vimokkham upasampajja vihareyyan”ti.
dn24:2.21.11: “Dukkaram kho etam, bhaggava, taya annaditthikena annakhantikena annarucikena annatrayogena annatracariyakena subham vimokkham upasampajja viharitum.
dn24:2.21.12: Ingha tvam, bhaggava, yo ca te ayam mayi pasado, tameva tvam sadhukamanurakkha”ti.
dn24:2.21.13: “Sace tam, bhante, maya dukkaram annaditthikena annakhantikena annarucikena annatrayogena annatracariyakena subham vimokkham upasampajja viharitum.
dn24:2.21.14: Yo ca me ayam, bhante, bhagavati pasado, tamevaham sadhukamanurakkhissami”ti.
dn24:2.21.16: Attamano bhaggavagotto paribbajako bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
